activity.text:
hi @sainak can i work on this issue? 
my implementation plan will be :

-i will make a reusable component named Header in a Common/components/ directory named in Header.js file
-and another component named HeaderCountBlock in CAREUI/display/Count.js directory for no of counts of respection sections like results sample like this
![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/120932783/42ceffd8-d418-42d6-8ca8-f7b08e3f6a8e)
-for the header section each component like searchbox , advanced filter , switch tabs will be sent as a props and will render 

and the final result may look like this 
![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/120932783/5f5170fe-49ff-447d-b11d-c979ace1e58b)
![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/120932783/329b302a-e90a-457e-b89f-e32708444431)
